thread.title: Radnor School Employee Accused of Showing Students Sex Videos
thread.title_full: Radnor School Employee Accused of Showing Students Sex Videos

author: CBS Philly
title: Radnor School Employee Accused of Showing Students Sex Videos
text:
Radnor School Employee Accused of Showing Students Sex Videos February 23, 2017 11:50 AM Filed Under: Radnor Police Department 
RADNOR, Pa. (CBS)—The Radnor Police Department has launched an investigation after they say a school aide showed students sex videos earlier this month. 
Police responded to The Village School back on Feb. 9 after they were contacted about inappropriate pictures being shown to students. 
According to Lt. Christopher Flanagan, with the Radnor Police Department, Maya Danee Johnson, 35, of Philadelphia—who was a counselor and school aide–allegedly showed three juvenile students and one adult student inappropriate pictures and even flash students multiple times. Maya Danee Johnson (Photo/ Radnor Police Department) 
“Ms Johnson had also flashed the students we had just mentioned, her buttocks at different points and time while at the school,” said Flanagan. 
Police say some of the students saw videos on a cell phone. 
“And it was a video that was on Ms. Johnson’s cell phone that she was playing out in the own and two minors saw that,” said Det. Tj Schreiber. 
The school was immediately notified by the students police said. BREAKING: Maya Danee Johnson, counselor/aide at Radnor's The Village School, charged in connection to showing students sex videos @CBSPhilly pic.twitter.com/ql9wSX8nOE 
— Joe Holden (@JoeHoldenCBS3) February 23, 2017 
Johnson has been arrested and is facing charges of corruption of minors and disorderly conduct. 
Police say Johnson was previously employed with five other “schools” where she may have come in contact with students. 
Police say they are following up with those schools.
